attributes.action: stop charging asthmatics for prescription drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today is the anniversary of the death of the actress Charlotte Coleman. As a fitting tribute to her talent asthma sufferers should be exempt from prescription charges. Asthma suffers have to have at least two types of inhalers which are charged at the current rate, which means for every prescription we are being charged £12 plus for the right to live. The morality of whether it is right to charge people for the right to breath is the question.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop charging asthmatics for prescription drugs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13947.asp

Prime Minister's Office
